headline: USA Truck Market Outlook to 2029: Strategic Urban Hubs and Infrastructure Investments Further Bolster Logistics Networks, Shaping a Promising Future
summary: The USA Truck Market is ripe with opportunities from e-commerce growth, technological advancements in telematics and automation, electric truck expansion, and innovative logistics solutions.Dublin, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "USA Truck Market Outlook to 2029" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.The USA Truck Market was valued at USD 800 billion, based on a five-year historical analysis.
